main event: A civilian observed a cigar-like object that was motionless and yellowish-white for about 20-25 seconds before it suddenly disappeared.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on November 11, 1957 in S.W. Knoxville, Tennessee., The object was described as being similar to a basketball in size and shape., The observer reported that the object moved from one point to another before vanishing., A balloon was launched just prior to the sighting, which could explain the observation., The weather conditions were calm and the sky was clear at the time of the sighting.
